channel.title: Zulrune - #1 HD Economic Spawn
channel.description:
[URL=http://zulrune.com]Homepage[/URL] | [URL=http://zulrune.com/forum/]Forum[/URL] | [URL=http://play.zulrune.com/]Play[/URL] | [URL=http://zulrune.com/vote/]Vote[/URL] | [URL=http://zulrune.com/scores/]Highscores[/URL]
[b]Introduction[/b]
Zulrune is the [b]best HD spawn/economy[/b] server that prides itself on the quality of our combat, community, and economy. Pking is a huge part of the community here, but the economy is just as important. Skillers serve a purpose to pkers, so everyone has a place. Although we are spawn, our economy is tight - not everything is spawnable. Expensive items must be earned, either through minigames, pking, or voting. As a spawn server, we also target players who enjoy questing: quests unlock new things, such as pets, cool cosmetics, and powerful weapons.
The design of Zulrune is very unique in the current RSPS state. We know what [b]you [/b]want, and we serve it to [b]you[/b].
[b]Media[/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/z1gQHh8.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/4qYaUea.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/WvGwSPd.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/y7xqLIt.png[/img]

item.title: Zulrune - #1 HD Economic Spawn
item.dc:creator: @ScapeSoft ScapeSoft
item.description:
@ScapeSoft wrote:

Soulcist:

Aren’t you already running another community? Anyway, from the media I see there’s a few interesting components here but other than that, I’m personally not interested. I do wish the best of luck.

I’m not running another community, but thanks.
